website_summaries.verdict: The same bold results as the original Better Than Sex mascara but now waterproof.
pros: Truly waterproof formula holds up against rain, sweat, swimming pools, and even stays put in the shower
Provides all the volume and pigmentation of the original Better Than Sex mascara
Volume and curl last all day
cons: Waterproof formula takes a long time to dry

customer_reviews.title: False claims as usual...
customer_reviews.text: Whoever named this must still be a virgin. Not waterproof and will leave a mess of flakes and smudges under your eyes within two hours of applying without even working up a sweat or getting caught in the rain. CAN ANYONE PLEASE RECOMMEND A WATERPROOF, SMUDGE PROOF, FLAKE PROOF MASCARA THAT ACTUALLY STAYS PUT UNTIL REMOVED? ...EVEN WHEN APPLIED TO LOWER LASHES? I feel like I have tried them all and they all flat out lie.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora D'Orable

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’d heard that this was a good mascara and I’d never wear anything else. I can say I was very disappointed. I’m in my 40’s and looking for a mascara that looks full without being clumpy. I applied several coats without much affect. I later looked and it was clumpy. By the evening it was flacking off and getting in my eyes. It was as if the mascara was very old and dried up. I’ll be trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa444

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof???
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of BTS mascara. Wanted a good waterproof version for summer (swimming and allergies). Love the way my lashes look. The wand takes a few tries to get used to. Not liking the "waterproof" as it seems to come off easily. Will most likely buy again though. Pricey so I would buy the travel size again.
customer_reviews.author: Homeychick

customer_reviews.title: I have used this a few times and its great. Its easy to apply and don't not get ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my hospital bag for when I give birth to my baby girl! With my son all my pictures had smeared mascara and I wanted that to be different this time around! I have used this a few times and its great. Its easy to apply and don't not get messy after some tears!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! Stays on, no smudging and it gives great length to my lashes! It is definitely waterproof. Iust use coconut oil to remove it at night. Just wish it was a larger tube! I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: No better than a less expensive supermarket brand.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the big deal is about this stuff. It didn't give me sexier lashes than an inexpensive supermarket brand. It stayed put, but no better than an inexpensive supermarket brand. And by the end of the day, my lashes felt like they were clumped together with cement, just like an inexpensive supermarket brand.
customer_reviews.author: AKinOR

customer_reviews.title: It may be for you it may not
customer_reviews.text: I e heard so many good things about this product found had it in my save for later most got it when it went on sale. So for the price not bad but it wasn’t as awesome as I expected but I do have very faint natural lashes so maby the coverage for me, was all I can get right now. It may work better for someone with at least a descent amount of lashes to use it on. Came off easily with makeup remover not like most of the tar like waterproof mascaras I’ve used before. So Clinique waterproof is still my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset that I wasted my money. I love better than sex mascara but this came dry as heck. It hardly wanted to coat my lashes. I could have just bought an $8 one at the dollar store for what quality this came in
customer_reviews.author: Juno

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute FAVORITE mascara ever. I gave it only 3 stars for easy to remove, because it isn't, but thats a huge plus for me! This mascara does its job and then some! I ran out, and started using my It Superhero mascara, which i used to love, only to find it didnt compare in the slightest to Better Than Sex waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: James chavez

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara I've ever bought. Makes my lashes look long and pretty without looking like I have too much on. Doesn't get clumpy and thick looking. Just a natural look. I'm sure if you put extra layers it would give a different look.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: Kept my makeup from running at my daughter's wedding! Used micellar water to remove.... it wouldn't come off with regular eye make up remover. But applied beautifully and was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara out there
customer_reviews.text: Makes my lashes so full and it doesn't get goopy. My eyes tear alot so waterproof is a must. It does come off with face cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to remove, not much volume or length
customer_reviews.text: Not much volume, it is so hard when it dries and impossible to remove, the look is not worth the trouble removing it, I would not recommend this. I will stick with Maybelline and Loreal
customer_reviews.author: gin

customer_reviews.title: Lashes look great, for a few hours.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara makes my lashes look great, but it does not seem to he waterproof in the slightest. It smudges easily, and often times it is off of my bottom lashes before the end of the day. It makes my lashes look amazing, however. I can count on it if I'm only going to need it to hold up for 4-6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SIZE FOR BEING MINI WAS SUPRISED
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS AWESOME AS ALWAYS AND WAS SUPRISINGLY ALOT LARGER THAN I EXPECTED. ESPECIALLY FOR THE PRICE. CAME WAY FASTER THAN IT SAID AS WELL
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lashes look super long
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara every I always buy the mini so it doesn't dry out After twelve his or so it does begin to flack a bit
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely waterproof! After going through so many drugstore mascaras I finially found my favorite! No smudging even spending all day at Disney on a hot Florida summer day!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to mascara! It gives amazing volume and works wonders, I use this during vacations and when I do makeup for weddings and it has not let me down. I found that after a period of time the original (non-waterproof) Better Than Sex will start to flake but the waterproof does not. It is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Recieved used product
customer_reviews.text: The box I received was damaged and the mascara had no protective seal of any kind. I'm pretty sure I received a used product so I returned it without trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It took several coats to get the desired effect and even then, I still was not happy with the length of my lashes. The product is way too wet and stays wet for at least 10 minutes therefore smudging all over my eye lids until it was dry. The brush is too fat and unwieldy. I will be returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand but very disappointed with the product it's dry don't know if it was old or what to bad I would have kept ordering
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Mascara I received was dried up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these mascaras.. 1 was dried up.. so that is why I rated low quality. I have never ordered this product through Amazon before, but usually I love this mascara.. doubt if I order again thru here.. There is a No Return Policy on makeup.. so you are taking a chance..
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: Gentle to your lashes
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product! Long last thru day! Gives depth, volume, fullness!! The best brand I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Thru my eyes!!!

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: It was thick and clumpy the first time I opened it. Seemed to be old
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come off!
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to get off, will not come off with make up wipes. I had so many eye lashes come out because of it. I'm afraid to use it agian!
customer_reviews.author: KayCe

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The wand is great for applying. However, the most recent one I bought seems dry and a little old. Watch your dates before you throw out the box
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Cartagine

customer_reviews.title: Smears under eyes
customer_reviews.text: This mascara smears under eyes and comes in a very small tube, a little larger than a sample size
customer_reviews.author: Danice

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I can work out at the gym hard core and my mascara is still perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lita Singh

customer_reviews.title: Sexy lashes
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! Makes my lashes look thick and full. Definitely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Clumpiest mascara I have ever used. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: stacey s chaney

customer_reviews.title: Very Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: The mascara is very clumpy and FR from waterproof. I gauge my mascara on how long it stays on. This did not even last until noon and looked like I had been out all night partying.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Pay for quality
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product and I love it. Still expensive for my taste, but I’d say so far it’s worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara- very wet and heavy for the first few uses - and expensive but well worth it after first few uses !
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: The Best-Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Truly works! It’s about time I found 1 that really works! No more searching and paying for poor quality of others!
customer_reviews.author: Lisamari Pena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: First time using the waterproof version. Bought it for a funeral and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product received was not the same as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Barely any mascara came out on the brush and when I applied more then one coat it clumped my lashes together and added no length. I purchased the sample size to see if it was worth buying the large size because of all the great things I had heard online but I'm glad I didn't now
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof isn’t a joke! Make sure you have babyoil or makeup remover to get it off. Really great coverage and color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended. However, the waterproof mascara, is not waterproof. Pretty disappointed about that, but satisfied with it in all other aspects. Unfortunately because its not waterproof, it was a waste of money and I will not be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: T Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush! I did use primer with it so I think that really helped the volume. My roommate also got one. She agreed with me! I will buy the large size when this runs out
customer_reviews.author: Brandi C.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite mascara!!! Bought this travel one because I don’t need waterproof often, but this gets the perfect amount!
customer_reviews.author: Nicoya Hall

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I first used it 3 years ago, I will not use any other brand. Too faced mascara is awesome! Lasts through sleeping & a shower!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca West

customer_reviews.title: Branding on Point
customer_reviews.text: After rave reviews from my sister-in-law, I decided to give “Better Than $ex” a go, although I was dubious of their name claim. Ladies, this mascara is MUCH better than a bad or even mediocre encounter so I dub the name is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchase- Southern US

customer_reviews.title: Expected greatness from the reviews but...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t care for the brush. It did not apply smooth and even. The mascara itself burned my eyes. There is something in the ingredients that did not agree with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay on my eyelashes like waterproof mascara should.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received this waterproof mascara and it seemed like it was dried out when I apply it to my eyelashes is almost a prickly feeling there is product inside but seems used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While I liked the overall volume it gave to my lashes, it would run. By the end of the day, I had raccoon eyes. Not acceptable for a product at the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST MASCARA IN THE WORLD!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara on the market, period!...said this makeup guru.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks color anyway
customer_reviews.text: This product is not waterproof it stays on but somehow still leeks black it’s very weird
customer_reviews.author: Juliya M.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my Papa's funeral. I sobbed ALL day and it did not smudge.
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. If you have some crying to do, this is the only mascara for you. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Historia

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: It was way too thick and goopy. Didn’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: It was dried out!! I always heard good things about this mascara! Very disappointed, especially for it to be dried out!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsia

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt stay on all day. It was very clumpy as well. Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: invest in this product if you are looking for a long lasting waterproof mascara!
customer_reviews.text: great product and works like magic ! definitely going to repurchase !
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: the mascara is completely dried up can i can’t even use it. do not purchase, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Brittanee

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: It was too chaulky and didn’t really give the look I was looking for. Not dark enough
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Panzieri

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT waterproof at all or sweat resistant! Terribly disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara...but not this order. It was all dried up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia baxter

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. It is a sample size but they make you pay full price.
customer_reviews.author: Laudrey Lamadieu

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously small for the money. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: allyson rotan

customer_reviews.title: Brush
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of the brush. I feel like it’s too thick and can leave your lashes clumpy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely waterproof and the brush is great.
customer_reviews.text: smaller than i expected, but i kind of prefer that because this brand tends to dry out quickly. The smaller it is the less i have to throw away because of how goopy the end gets. Definitely waterproof and the brush is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Priddy

customer_reviews.title: Not Better Than Sex but got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Its worth the money. I used only 1 coat on top and bottom and I was satisfied my lashes looked extended with no clumps. I was proud to do my IGTV video after doing my make up. @sirentherocker for results Topic: Rich vs Broke
customer_reviews.author: Ceo

customer_reviews.title: I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara clumps so easily. I bought 2 at the time and I stuck with the other brand and I gave this one to my daughter. She loves it but walking around with clumpy eyelashes is not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: Wreck_Tangle

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I've heard people rave about this mascara... my experience with it wasn't great. This product claims to be waterproof, however, by the end of the day, I resembled a raccoon with dark circles under my eyes. If you don't mind that it's not waterproof, I'm sure it would work fine. If you're looking for actual waterproof mascara, I suggest looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: NIJ

customer_reviews.title: Thickens lashes
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick mascara that goes on smoothly and instant thickens lashes. I don’t find my lashes much longer though. Doesn’t flake.
customer_reviews.author: Julia's Disciple

customer_reviews.title: How to get compliments frequently
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very easy to use and is as described. Seems to get compliments about my eyes when wearing it. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie T. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Raccoon eyes
customer_reviews.text: Product is really bad for people with dark eye circles. Does not work well with concealer or realty much of anything. Not impressed and won't purschase again
customer_reviews.author: Princess of quite a lot

customer_reviews.title: Its waterproof. Have a good eye makeup remover.
customer_reviews.text: Love the non-waterproof so I got this for my wedding and it worked perfect. I definitely but it to the test!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really lengthens and thickens my lashes it is not better than sex, lol!
customer_reviews.author: BriggsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Must be an old bottle or something? Very very ...
customer_reviews.text: Must be an old bottle or something? Very very clumpy and thick. I added some saline to it to thin it out but still clumpy. Had to order another from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: User error? Unimpressed...
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product presented on a You Tube video. I was not as impressed with it as the model who used it.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Works great even if your lashes aren’t curly. Best mascara EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Marie P

customer_reviews.title: Smudges easily
customer_reviews.text: My lashes definitely look longer and fuller, however, it smudges very easily and I am constantly having to wipe under my eyes throughout the day. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Bottle is half empty.
customer_reviews.text: Work well! Lashes appear thicker and long. But bottle is only 25 percent full.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It really does make my eyelashes look longer .
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBeeGracious

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it and going to order more when this gets low.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Dried out.
customer_reviews.text: Too much money for the product to be dried out. Will update after I receive a new product.
customer_reviews.author: tameka hicks

customer_reviews.title: The feel!
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I had better mascara than this. It cracks and flakes off
customer_reviews.author: Diana

product_meta.title: Too Faced Better Than Sex Waterproof Mascara Black Mini 0.17 oz
product_meta.description: Take this mini waterproof mascara with you everywhere and literally anywhere. Conveniently sized to fit in purse or pocket. Apply to lashes and reapply if needed.
feature_bullets: Perfect travel size for on the go
